attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Pakistan has a massive army and Nuclear weapons, and they have been accused of training and aiding terrorists.
Why should our money (Over a Half Billion Pounds) be wasted on this nation, when we could do so much to help our own nation.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
Statements that don't actually request any action
